chunk:
The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%

Brand: The Ordinary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: AQUA (WATER), NIACINAMIDE, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ZINC PCA, DIMETHYL ISOSORBIDE, TAMARINDUS INDICA SEED GUM, XANTHAN GUM, ISOCETETH-20, ETHOXYDIGLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, CHLORPHENESIN.

Directions: Apply to entire face morning and evening befo

ing and evening before heavier creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Refer to our in-depth guide to patch testing.

Warnings: Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW:
Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
